titleStmt.title: A description of the four seasons or quarters of the year, as spring, summer, autumn and winter. Likewise of beautie, the bees and ants, and also on prodigality.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by Rob[ert]. Walton at the Globe and Compasses, at the west-end of St. Pauls Church, turning down towards Ludgate ...,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from Wing.
The imprint continues with an advertisement of what can be had at Walton's establishment.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the west-end of St. Pauls Church, turning down towards Ludgate
